message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,500?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While I believe the product is valuable, $11,500 is still a bit more than I had in mind.  Would you be open to $11,000?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I've already compromised quite a bit, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11,250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
